title: Introducing: Bug Machine
content:
Austin’s Bug Machine, the solo project (I assume) of the as yet unnamed man in the picture above, has a knack for writing insanely catchy synth-pop songs.

His debut EP Disconnect, available as a free download, is comprised of four dance-till-you-drop electronic numbers. With touches of a more upbeat, less stadium friendly M83, and even slight whiffs of Aphex Twin, the relentless Heart Is On The Floor yearns to be played to packed, sweaty indie club. Elsewhere there’s the repetitive swing of Sympathy and the infectious sample led bliss of Slugs, all complimented by Bug Machine’s soft, reassuring vocals.

Check out Slugs and Sympathy below, and head over to his bandcamp for a full download.
